name: Google
jobDescription: Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
jobExperience: 5+ years of experience in iOS app development
jobResponsibility: Design and build advanced applications for the iOS platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
educationalQualification: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
